_GEng_Sprite_CollisionSet: Define the collision shape of a Sprite Object
_GEng_Sprite_CollisionScrBorders: Test collision between a Sprite Object and all screen borders

```GEng_Sprite_Collision.au3
_GEng_Sprite_CollisionScrBorders(ByRef $hSprite, $iDynamique = 0)
Returns:
	No collision => 0

	Collision occures, one of the following:
		- $GEng_ScrBorder_Top
		- $GEng_ScrBorder_Bot
		- $GEng_ScrBorder_Left
		- $GEng_ScrBorder_Right```
